sentences.sentence: Scarlett: Turn me loose, you varlet and get out of here!
sentences.translation: 斯嘉丽：放开我，你这个无赖，出去！

sentences.sentence: SCARLETT:Turn me loose, you varlet , and get out of here.
sentences.translation: 思嘉：放开我，你这个无赖，快走开。

sentences.sentence: Jack, you bad egg, hooligan, varlet, dissembler, how dare you are?
sentences.translation: 杰克，你这个坏蛋，流氓，恶棍，伪君子，竟敢欺负我？
